dataset_id: BOREAS Level-2 MAS Surface Reflectance and Temperature Images in BSQ Format
title: BOREAS Level-2 MAS Surface Reflectance and Temperature Images in BSQ Format
summary: MAS images, along with other remotely sensed data, were collected to provide spatially extensive information over the primary study areas. This information includes biophysical parameter maps such as surface reflectance and temperature. Collection of the MAS images occurred over the study areas during the 1994 field campaigns.
